Package it.unipv.insfw23.TicketWave.modelDomain.user

Class ConnectedUser

java.lang.Object
it.unipv.insfw23.TicketWave.modelDomain.user.ConnectedUser
public class ConnectedUser extends Object
public class (singleton) that is used to different stages at the login and holds a user as a private attribute
